description: Somewhere on a stretch of desert highway, five groups of travelers will find themselves confronting an ever-changing feeling of dread through five interlocking, horrific stories.
synopsis: A man's home becomes the site of supernatural occurrences following his wife's untimely passing. Alan Ruck (FERRIS BUELLER'S DAY OFF) stars in this fun slice of pulpy horror from Fantastic Fest alumni Mike Williamson (IN THE WALL).
title: Deathly
